title: Rebel Galaxy
notes: crashes when main menu loads in Direct3D 11/OpenGL mode. Crashes in Direct3D 9 mode when game starts

title: Rebel Galaxy
notes: Works in Direct3D 9/OpenGL mode with disabled dynamic lights, but random crashes when starting the game(when main menu loads)

title: Rebel Galaxy
notes: Add "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" without brackets to launch options. Game will start settings menu. Choose DirectX 11 and do NOT choose Borderless Window. Game will start Main Menu without issue. Try to start new Game - This fails in 1 out of 10 trys. Everything else seems to run fine!

title: Rebel Galaxy
notes: Only issue appears to be occasional sound issues (crackling, stuttering)

Works in 'Windowed' and 'Windowed Fullscreen' but not in 'Fullscreen' mode.  Direct3D 11 renderer works perfectly, but OpenGL does not work at all.  Game runs perfectly when I set to Direct3D 11 and Windowed Fullscreen.
title: Rebel Galaxy

notes: Weirdly long load times that feel "hung"
